items.name: case boolean
items.desc: A feature with a value of YES or NO.

items.name: case enumeration
items.desc: A feature that can have one of several discrete values, strings, or numbers.

items.name: case range
items.desc: A feature with a value that lies within a range.

items.name: case template
items.desc: A group of one or more rectangular scan areas that can be used with a scanner functional unit.
